price: Ne nsεnkyerεnee no mu bi ne sε, Ɔbͻͻ mo firi mfuturo mu, afei hwε, mo ayε nnipa ahwete (wͻ asaase so).
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَنتُم بَشَرٞ تَنتَشِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi an khalaqakum min turābin thumma idhā antum basharun tantashirūna
